name: R5-MessageHeader-R4-MessageHeader
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MessageHeader into FHIR R4

element.display: A resource that describes a message that is exchanged between systems

target.display: A resource that describes a message that is exchanged between systems
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader`

R5 `MessageHeader.author` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.author` - author has change due to type change: R5 `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `author`
R5 `MessageHeader.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.contained`

element.display: Link to the definition for this message

target.display: Link to the definition for this message
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.definition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.definition`
R5 `MessageHeader.destination` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.destination`

element.display: Actual destination address or Endpoint resource

target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.destination.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MessageHeader.destination.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.destination.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `MessageHeader.destination.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.name`
R5 `MessageHeader.destination.receiver` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.receiver`

element.display: Particular delivery destination within the destination

target.display: Particular delivery destination within the destination
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.destination.target` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.destination.target`

element.display: Event code or link to EventDefinition

target.display: Code for the event this message represents or link to event definition
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.event[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.event[x]` - event[x] has change due to type change: R5 event[x] canonical has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 event[x]

R5 `MessageHeader.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: The actual content of the message

target.display: The actual content of the message
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.focus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.focus`
R5 `MessageHeader.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.implicitRules`
R5 `MessageHeader.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MessageHeader.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `MessageHeader.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.meta`

R5 `MessageHeader.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `MessageHeader.reason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.reason`

element.display: If this is a reply to prior message

target.display: If this is a reply to prior message
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.response` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.response`

R5 `MessageHeader.response.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.response.code` - code has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/response-code|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/response-code|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `MessageHeader.response.details` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.response.details`

R5 `MessageHeader.response.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.response.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MessageHeader.response.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.response.id`

R5 `MessageHeader.response.identifier` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.response.identifier` - identifier has change due to type change: R5 identifier Identifier has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 identifier

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.response.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.response.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `MessageHeader.responsible` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.responsible`

element.display: Real world sender of the message

target.display: Real world sender of the message
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.sender` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.sender` - sender has change due to type change: R5 `sender` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `sender`
R5 `MessageHeader.source` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source`
R5 `MessageHeader.source.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source.contact`

element.display: Actual source address or Endpoint resource

target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.source.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.source.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MessageHeader.source.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.source.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageHeader.source.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `MessageHeader.source.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source.name`

element.display: Name of software running the system

target.display: Name of software running the system
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.source.software` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source.software`
R5 `MessageHeader.source.version` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.source.version`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `MessageHeader.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageHeader.text`
